meta.title: From GROUND to HOG
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: Okay, campers, rise and shine, and don't forget your booties 'cause it's cooooold out there today! That’s right, woodchuck-chuckers, it’s [GROUNDHOG DAY](/2026/02/05)!

ladder.clue: Remove an N from <> and anagram to get a kind of fruit
Change one letter in <> to get something a business might be doing to prices
Where lots of <> are "bound" to be?
Split <> after the third letter, pronounce both parts separately, and it sounds like this lovely gift
Go {}-<>, i.e. act as unrestrained as a <> {}
